name: EnWiFi by EnGenius
description: EnWifi is a convenient Wi-Fi management tool for EnGenius-brand outdoor and indoor Wi-Fi devices. Configure and monitor EnGenius access points/CPE from a smartphone or tablet.  EnWifi offers single or group device configuration and updates on your networks latest status. Access EnGenius devices anytime.  1. Supported models: EnGenius outdoor/indoor devices, please refer to the supported model list in App -Information.  2. Features: a. Configure a single access point or group of access points directly via smartphone or tablet. b. Change operating modes remotely. c. Real-time monitoring of wireless device status. d. Backup of configuration files for easy deployment. e. Firmware upgrades for both indoor and outdoor devices.
